feed.title: Less is better: OK my MacBook Pro is hot but this is amazing
feed.subtitle: John Lam on software

entry.title: OK my MacBook Pro is hot but this is amazing
entry.summary:
There were lots of jealous looks as I was walking around with my MacBook Pro at Tech Ed this year. A bunch of folks cornered me and asked me about my experience living the dual OS lifestyle (I love it).

The MacBook Pro really stood out at Tech Ed, but what happens next year when lots of folks have bought their MacBook Pros and they’re as common as ThinkPads? Well, it appears that this is the solution. I want Prowler.
entry.content:
There were lots of jealous looks as I was walking around with my MacBook Pro at Tech Ed this year. A bunch of folks cornered me and asked me about my experience living the dual OS lifestyle (I love it).

The MacBook Pro really stood out at Tech Ed, but what happens next year when lots of folks have bought their MacBook Pros and they’re as common as ThinkPads? Well, it appears that this is the solution. I want Prowler.
